name: setup
description: A set of commands for setting up and configuring TicketBird

options.name: init
options.description: Initiates the bot and setups needed channels and categories

options.name: repair
options.description: Repairs the bot's configuration and recreates missing channels or categories

options.name: language
options.description: Sets the language for the bot to use when sending responses. Defaults to english

options.name: language
options.description: The language for the bot to use when sending responses

options.name: use-projects
options.description: Sets whether to use projects for helping sort tickets. Defaults to false

options.name: use
options.description: Whether to use projects for helping sort tickets

options.name: timing
options.description: Allows changing timings for the various automatic actions performed by TicketBird

options.name: action
options.description: The action you want to change the timing of

options.name: days
options.description: Amount of days (added to hours; default: 0)

options.name: hours
options.description: Amount of hours (added to days; default: 0)
